类 api.Card
的使用

  • 使用Card的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    api  

    • api中Card的使用

      返回Card的api中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static Card[] Card.createArray(java.lang.Integer... cards)
      Creates an array of cards from a variable-length list of integers representing their ranks.
      static Card[] Card.createArray(java.lang.String cardString)
      Creates an array of cards from a string.
      Card[] Hand.getMainCards()
      Returns a copy of the main cards for this hand.
      Card[] Hand.getSideCards()
      Returns a copy of the side cards for this hand.
      参数类型为Card的api中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      boolean IEvaluator.canSatisfy(Card[] mainCards)
      Determines whether the given group of cards satisfies the criteria this evaluator.
      boolean IEvaluator.canSubsetSatisfy(Card[] allCards)
      Determines whether there exists a subset of the given cards that satisfies the criteria for this evaluator.
      int Card.compareTo(Card rhs)
      Orders cards by rank from highest to lowest, and within rank, by suit from highest (SPADES) to lowest (CLUBS).
      int Card.compareToIgnoreSuit(Card rhs)
      Orders cards by rank from highest to lowest, ignoring suit.
      Hand IEvaluator.createHand(Card[] allCards, int[] subset)
      Returns a hand whose main cards consist of the indicated subset of the given cards.
      Hand IEvaluator.getBestHand(Card[] allCards)
      Returns the best possible hand satisfying this evaluator's criteria that can be formed from the given list of cards.
      参数类型为Card的api中的构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Hand(Card[] mainCards, Card[] sideCards, IEvaluator evaluator)
      Constructs a new Hand from the given cards.
      Hand(Card[] mainCards, Card[] sideCards, IEvaluator evaluator)
      Constructs a new Hand from the given cards.
